changeSet.author: Zoe
changeSet.comment: 第三方-新建第三方订单表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_social_tenant_order` ( `id` BIGINT ( 20 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `channel_order_id` VARCHAR ( 100 ) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '渠道订单号', `app_id` VARCHAR ( 255 ) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '应用标识', `tenant_id` VARCHAR ( 255 ) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '企业的唯一标识，各大平台名词不一致，这里统一使用租户表示', `platform` TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '所属平台(1: 企业微信, 2: 钉钉, 3: 飞书)', `order_data` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单数据', `is_deleted` TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `created_at` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_tenant_app` ( `tenant_id`, `app_id` ) USING BTREE COMMENT '租户应用标识', KEY `idx_channel_order_id` ( `channel_order_id` ) USING BTREE COMMENT '租户订单号' ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '第三方平台集成-订单表';
